while 1:
	N,M=map(int,raw_input().split());
	if N==0 and M==0:
		break
	else:
		A,B=N,M; CR=0; ct=0;
		while A or B:
			q,r=A%10,B%10;
			if q+r+CR>9:
				ct+=1;	CR=1;
			A/=10;	B/=10;
		if ct==0:
			print "No carry operation."
		elif ct==1:
			print "1 carry operation."
		else:
			print "%d carry operations." %ct
